title: Effective Language Leadership Education Through Online Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Blended design integrating real-time interaction and self-directed learning activities in a bring-your-own-device (BYOD) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the principles of designing digital learning materials applying cognitive load theory.
Learners can evaluate online language education content based on multimedia learning theory and propose improvement plans.
Learners can apply online learning management strategies incorporating metacognitive strategies in practical settings.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
